name: NFCReaderSessionProtocol
desc: A general interface for interacting with a reader session.

items.name: var isReady: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the reader session is started and ready to use.

items.name: func invalidate()
items.desc: Closes the reader session, which prevents it from being reused.

items.name: func invalidate(errorMessage: String)
items.desc: Closes the reader session and displays an error message to the user.

items.name: var alertMessage: String
items.desc: A custom description that helps users understand how they can use NFC reader mode in your app.
